thread.section_title: LaserAway Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LaserAway | www.laseraway.com | 3 of 27
thread.title: Sal Salvino

author: Sal Salvino
title: Sal Salvino
text:
Sasha Gordon was the number one of the two best treatment experiences ever i have had so far. I mentioned this to Shelbie Ellis , who is an awesome person and manager. I would also like to state that my 3rd or 4th visit was terrible because the person doing the treatment rushed it and was very not caring to be at work that day and it showed.
I walked out almost to the point of never coming back, but I did and made sure I did not get not caring person again. Sorry I never got her name...
Sal S.
